front.title: Problem Statement and Requirement: Protocol between Mobile Access Point and Terminal

abstract.t: This document discusses the problem and requirement of thecommunication protocol between mobile access point and terminal.With the evolution of mobile communication, there are various kind ofwireless communication technologies such as GSM, GPRS, WCDMA, LTE,WLAN, WiMAX, and TDS-CDMA et al. Each of these wirelesscommunication has independent connection, mobility and configurationmanagement. This document would like converge all these functioninto a common ground especially in the environment of multipleconnections.
